Mod info:
God Mode

Installation instructions: 
1. Install the normal version.
2. Finish the tutorial and connect to your google account. Non rooted users can ignore step 3.
3. Rooted users should install Lucky Patcher (If you do not already have it installed), give it root permissions and go to toolbox. Scroll down until you find "Patch to Android" tap it. Check the first 2 boxes and apply.
4. Signed is for non-rooted users. Unsigned is for root users only. 
5. Uninstall the game but donâ€™t clear itâ€™s data. Now install one mod. With Modded Google Play you can install over the normal version. If you have the previous version of God Mode mod you can install it on top of the old one.
6. Launch the game and it will log you into Google Play.
7. Rooted users can still play the mod as a guest and connect to
8. Non-Root users will have to play as guest.

Notes:
The mod has never banned people from using it but let's play smart, ok?
- To be careful about your account use a different google account not yours.
- Don't try Galactic War table under level 40.
- Avoid playing the Guild table when having a Guild tag under level 22.
